mapper.select: SELECT si.shipping_instruction_seq, si.shipping_instruction_name, si.shipping_instruction_status, si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date, so.client_name, si.shipping_instruction_total_quantity, si.shipping_instruction_address, si.shipping_instruction_note, FROM tb_shipping_instruction si JOIN tb_sales_order so ON si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq WHERE si.shipping_instruction_seq = #{shippingInstructionSeq}

SELECT i.item_name, i.item_division, i.item_price, sii.shippingInstructionItemQuantity, sii.shippingInstructionItemNote, (i.item_price * sii.shippingInstructionItemQuantity) AS itemTotalQuantity FROM tb_shipping_instruction_item sii JOIN tb_item i ON sii.item_seq = i.item_seq WHERE sii.shipping_instruction_seq = #{shippingInstructionSeq}

SELECT si.shipping_instruction_seq, si.shipping_instruction_scheduled_shipment_date, si.shipping_instruction_name, si.shipping_instruction_total_quantity, so.client_name, si.shipping_instruction_address si.shipping_instruction_note FROM tb_shipping_instruction si JOIN tb_sales_order so ON si.sales_order_seq = so.sales_order_seq WHERE TRUE
AND #{startDate} <= tb_quotation.quotation_quotation_date
AND #{endDate} >= tb_quotation.quotation_quotation_date
AND tb_client.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{clientName}, '%')
